title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Ann Arbor, MI, USA
description: Come join what may be the only MONTHLY code retreat/coder dojo. Always free, but registration is required via the website (http://codecraftsmansaturdays.blogspot.com/). As always, we'll be serving breakfast and lunch (no pizza here). We'll be connected with the rest of the globe and sharing the fun atÂ http://codecraftsmansaturdays.blogspot.com/.
